pr_title: Log failure when cleaning shard follow task

timeline.message:
Log failure when cleaning shard follow task

When clenaing a shard follow task after an index has been deleted, an
exception can occur submitting the complete persistent task
action. However, this exception message is not logged. This commit
addresses this by including the exception that led to the failure in the
log message.

timeline.bodyText: This name change is to avoid confusion with the name of the Exception instance in the onFailure callback.
timeline.author: jasontedor
